array_get_dataAt.tooltip: Get the element at specified index in array

number_to.tooltip: Converts an ASCII code number to its corresponding character

toascii.tooltip: Gets the ASCII code value of a character

number_to_string.tooltip: Converts a number to string type

char.tooltip: Enter a single character. Supports escape characters: \n(newline), \t(tab), \r(carriage return), \\(backslash), \'(single quote), \"(double quote), \0(null)

text_join.tooltip: Join any number of text items together

text_create_join_container.tooltip: Add, remove, or reorder text join sections

text_create_join_item.tooltip: Add an item to the text join

text_length.tooltip: Get the number of characters in text

text_indexOf.tooltip: Return the position of first/last occurrence of substring in text

string_endsWith.tooltip: Checks if text ends with the specified suffix

string_startsWith.tooltip: Checks if text starts with the specified prefix

text_charAt.tooltip: Get the character at specified position in text

tt_getSubstring.tooltip: Get a substring from text within specified range

text_trim.tooltip: Remove spaces from one or both ends of text

text_count.tooltip: Count how many times substring appears in text

text_replace.tooltip: Replace all occurrences of text with new content

text_reverse.tooltip: Reverse the order of characters in text

string_to_something.tooltip: Converts string to specified data type
